Features

Beginner Lessons

These are a complete set of Beginner Lessons starting from learning the parts of the EV3 and downloading software through a basic line follower. Complete these lessons in order.

Intermediate Lessons

These lessons begin with making My Blocks and end with parallel beams.

Advanced Lessons

These are Advanced Lessons that include the Gyro Sensor.

Robot Designs

Helium is designed to be clean and pleasant to navigate.

Going Beyond

These are lessons that for a user who has completed all our lessons and wants to try something new. They include third-party sensors.

Advanced Features

Systems like disqus, google AdSense, google analytics, Google maps are integrated.
